channel.title: NectusCraft Minecraft Server
channel.description:
NectusCraft is a PvP anarchy server, stealing and griefing is allowed!
NectusCraft has opened its doors to gamers. It's a pretty open group, meaning if you want to play, no matter your skill level is! We are a social group of people that want to play. All we expect from you is to have fun and bring a positive attitude to our community. Our members are required to show respect to other members and players. If we find that our members are abusing then consequences will be handed out accordingly.
Nectuscraft, while still in its infancy, is seeking to establish itself as a home for gamers who will be loyal to its value.
Why wait? Sign up at our forums www.nectuscraft.com Our IP is: nectussurvival.com
